Class Main

java.lang.Object
Main
public class Main extends Object
Main class to manage user interactions with the portfolio management system. Provides functionality for logging in, signing up, and managing assets, accounts, and zakat.

  • Method Details

    • print_options

      public static void print_options()
      Prints the main menu options for the user to choose from.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Main method for running the portfolio management system. It facilitates user login, asset management, zakat calculations, and more.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used).
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file reading/writing.

    • log_in

      public static Investor log_in(Scanner input, file_manager fm) throws Exception
      Logs in an investor based on username/email and password.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      fm - file_manager object for managing investors' data.
      Returns:
      The logged-in Investor object, or null if login fails.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file reading.

    • sign_up

      public static Investor sign_up(Scanner input, file_manager fm, ValidationImpl checker) throws Exception
      Registers a new investor with provided personal details.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      fm - file_manager object for managing investors' data.
      checker - Validation object for input validation.
      Returns:
      The newly created Investor object.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during file operations.

    • Add_asset

      public static void Add_asset(Scanner input, Investor inv, ValidationImpl checker) throws Exception
      Adds a new asset to the investor's portfolio.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      inv - The investor whose portfolio will be updated.
      checker - Validation object for input validation.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during asset creation.

    • sell_from_asset

      public static void sell_from_asset(Scanner input, Investor current_investor)
      Sells a percentage of the selected asset from the investor's portfolio.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      current_investor - The investor selling the asset.

    • edit_asset

      public static void edit_asset(Scanner input, Investor inv)
      Allows the investor to edit an asset's details in the portfolio.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      inv - The investor whose asset will be edited.

    • remove_asset

      public static void remove_asset(Scanner input, Investor inv)
      Removes the specified asset from the investor's portfolio.
      Parameters:
      input - Scanner object for user input.
      inv - The investor whose asset will be removed.
